text: I was born in 1987. My hobbies are related to PCs (playing games, watching anime, listening to educational videos).
Love results, hate processes. If a process can be skipped, I will skip it for sure.
I like talking â€” you may ask me to stop and I will stop.
I'm trying to pay attention, but sometimes I'm thinking deeply, and then you won't be able to reach me until I'm done.
I hate reading books but love reading code.
